verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> which came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

ק֥וּם <WH6965> Arise וְיָרַדְתָּ֖ <WH3381> and go down בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <WH3335> to the potter's וְשָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> and there אַשְׁמִֽיעֲךָ֥ <WH8085> and there I will cause thee to hear אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרָֽי׃ <WH1697> my words

וָאֵרֵ֖ד <WH3381> Then I went down בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <WH3335> to the potter's [וְהִנֵּהוּ כ] (וְהִנֵּה־ ה֛וּא <WH2009> behold ק) עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> he wrought מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> a work עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָבְנָֽיִם׃ <WH70> on the wheels

וְנִשְׁחַ֣ת <WH7843> was marred הַכְּלִ֗י <WH3627> And the vessel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after ה֥וּא <WH1931> he עֹשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> that he made בַּחֹ֖מֶר <WH2563> of clay בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> in the hand הַיּוֹצֵ֑ר <WH3335> of the potter וְשָׁ֗ב <WH7725> it again וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <WH6213> so he made כְּלִ֣י <WH3627> vessel אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> another כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after יָשַׁ֛ר <WH3474> good בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> as seemed הַיּוֹצֵ֖ר <WH3335> to the potter לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to make פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֽוֹר׃ <WH559> came to me saying

הֲכַיּוֹצֵ֨ר <WH3335> with you as this potter הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this לֹא־ <WH3808> not אוּכַ֨ל <WH3201> cannot לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> I do לָכֶ֛ם בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ? saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold כַחֹ֙מֶר֙ <WH2563> Behold as the clay בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> hand הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <WH3335> [is] in the potter's כֵּן־ <WH3651> so אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> in בְּיָדִ֖י <WH3027> so [are] ye in mine hand בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

רֶ֣גַע <WH7281> [At what] instant אֲדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> I shall speak עַל־ <WH5921> concerning גּ֖וֹי <WH1471> concerning a nation וְעַל־ <WH5921> concerning מַמְלָכָ֑ה <WH4467> and concerning a kingdom לִנְת֥וֹשׁ <WH5428> to pluck up וְלִנְת֖וֹץ <WH5422> and to pull down וּֽלְהַאֲבִֽיד׃ <WH6> and to destroy

וְשָׁב֙ <WH7725> turn הַגּ֣וֹי <WH1471> If that nation הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he מֵרָ֣עָת֔וֹ <WH7451> from their evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> against whom I have pronounced עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> against וְנִֽחַמְתִּי֙ <WH5162> I will repent עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָשַׁ֖בְתִּי <WH2803> that I thought לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do לֽוֹ׃ ס

וְרֶ֣גַע <WH7281> And [at what] instant אֲדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> I shall speak עַל־ <WH5921> concerning גּ֖וֹי <WH1471> concerning a nation וְעַל־ <WH5921> concerning מַמְלָכָ֑ה <WH4467> and concerning a kingdom לִבְנֹ֖ת <WH1129> to build וְלִנְטֹֽעַ׃ <WH5193> and to plant

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> If it do [הָרָעָה כ] (הָרַע֙ <WH7451> adversity ק) בְּעֵינַ֔י <WH5869> in my sight לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> not שְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> that it obey בְּקוֹלִ֑י <WH6963> not my voice וְנִֽחַמְתִּי֙ <WH5162> then I will repent עַל־ <WH5921> of הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> of the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָמַ֖רְתִּי <WH559> wherewith I said לְהֵיטִ֥יב <WH3190> I would benefit אוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> ס

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> now אֱמָר־ <WH559> Now therefore go to speak נָ֣א <WH4994> Oh אֶל־ <WH413> to אִישׁ־ <WH376> to the men יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> of Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> and to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I יוֹצֵ֤ר <WH3335> Behold I frame עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> against רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> evil וְחֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH2803> against you and devise עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> against מַֽחֲשָׁבָ֑ה <WH4284> a device שׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> against you return נָ֗א <WH4994> Oh אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> ye now every one מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <WH1870> way הָֽרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> from his evil וְהֵיטִ֥יבוּ <WH3190> good דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1870> and make your ways וּמַעַלְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4611> and your doings

וְאָמְר֖וּ <WH559> And they said נוֹאָ֑שׁ <WH2976> There is no hope כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> after מַחְשְׁבוֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH4284> our own devices נֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> are going וְאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> and we will every one שְׁרִר֥וּת <WH8307> the imagination לִבּֽוֹ־ <WH3820> heart הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> of his evil נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> do ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שַֽׁאֲלוּ־ <WH7592> Ask נָא֙ <WH4994> now בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> ye now among the heathen מִ֥י <WH4310> Who שָׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> who hath heard כָּאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> another שַֽׁעֲרֻרִת֙ <WH8186> horrible thing עָשְׂתָ֣ה <WH6213> hath done מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> a very בְּתוּלַ֖ת <WH1330> such things the virgin יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

הֲיַעֲזֹ֥ב <WH5800> Will [a man] leave מִצּ֛וּר <WH6697> [which cometh] from the rock שָׂדַ֖י <WH7704> country שֶׁ֣לֶג <WH7950> the snow לְבָנ֑וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon אִם־ <WH518> ever יִנָּתְשׁ֗וּ <WH5428> be forsaken מַ֛יִם <WH4325> waters זָרִ֥ים <WH2114> that come from another place קָרִ֖ים <WH7119> is the cold נוֹזְלִֽים׃ <WH5140> flowing

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שְׁכֵחֻ֥נִי <WH7911> hath forgotten עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> Because my people לַשָּׁ֣וְא <WH7723> to vanity יְקַטֵּ֑רוּ <WH6999> me they have burned incense וַיַּכְשִׁל֤וּם <WH3782> and they have caused them to stumble בְּדַרְכֵיהֶם֙ <WH1870> in their ways שְׁבִילֵ֣י <WH7635> paths עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> [from] the ancient לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to walk נְתִיב֔וֹת <WH5410> in paths דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> [in] a way לֹ֥א <WH3808> cast סְלוּלָֽה׃ <WH5549> not cast up

לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> To make אַרְצָ֛ם <WH776> their land לְשַׁמָּ֖ה <WH8047> desolate [שְׁרוּקַת כ] (שְׁרִיקֹ֣ות <WH8292> bleating ק) עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> [and] a perpetual כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> Everyone עוֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> every one that passeth עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and יִשֹּׁ֖ם <WH8074> thereby shall be astonished וְיָנִ֥יד <WH5110> and wag בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> his head

כְּרֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> wind קָדִ֥ים <WH6921> them as with an east אֲפִיצֵ֖ם <WH6327> I will scatter לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אוֹיֵ֑ב <WH341> the enemy עֹ֧רֶף <WH6203> them the back וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not פָנִ֛ים <WH6440> and not the face אֶרְאֵ֖ם <WH7200> I will shew בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day אֵידָֽם׃ <WH343> of their calamity ס

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> Then said לְכ֨וּ <WH1980> Come וְנַחְשְׁבָ֣ה <WH2803> and let us devise עַֽל־ <WH5921> against יִרְמְיָהוּ֮ <WH3414> against Jeremiah מַחֲשָׁבוֹת֒ <WH4284> devices כִּי֩ <WH3588> Surely לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תֹאבַ֨ד <WH6> shall not perish תּוֹרָ֜ה <WH8451> for the law מִכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> from the priest וְעֵצָה֙ <WH6098> nor counsel מֵֽחָכָ֔ם <WH2450> from the wise וְדָבָ֖ר <WH1697> nor the word מִנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> from the prophet לְכוּ֙ <WH1980> Come וְנַכֵּ֣הוּ <WH5221> and let us smite בַלָּשׁ֔וֹן <WH3956> him with the tongue וְאַל־ <WH408> no נַקְשִׁ֖יבָה <WH7181> and let us not give heed אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> any דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <WH1697> to any of his words
הַקְשִׁ֥יבָה <WH7181> Give heed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> to me O LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> and וּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> and hearken לְק֥וֹל <WH6963> to the voice יְרִיבָֽי׃ <WH3401> of them that contend

הַיְשֻׁלַּ֤ם <WH7999> be recompensed תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> Thahash טוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> good רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> Shall evil כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָר֥וּ <WH3738> dig שׁוּחָ֖ה <WH7745> a pit לְנַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> for my soul זְכֹ֣ר ׀ <WH2142> Remember עָמְדִ֣י <WH5975> that I stood לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> before לְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> thee to speak עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> their behalf טוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> good לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> for them [and] to turn away אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמָתְךָ֖ <WH2534> thy wrath מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> Therefore תֵּ֨ן <WH5414> Therefore deliver up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶ֜ם <WH1121> their children לָרָעָ֗ב <WH7458> to the famine וְהַגִּרֵם֮ <WH5064> and pour out עַל־ <WH5921> up יְדֵי־ <WH3027> their [blood] by the force חֶרֶב֒ <WH2719> of the sword וְתִֽהְיֶ֨נָה <WH1961> become נְשֵׁיהֶ֤ם <WH802> and let their wives שַׁכֻּלוֹת֙ <WH7909> be bereaved וְאַלְמָנ֔וֹת <WH490> of their children and [be] widows וְאַ֨נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH376> their men יִֽהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become הֲרֻ֣גֵי <WH2026> be put מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> to death בַּח֣וּרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH970> [let] their young men מֻכֵּי־ <WH5221> [be] slain חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> in battle

תִּשָּׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> be heard זְעָקָה֙ <WH2201> Let a cry מִבָּ֣תֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH1004> from their houses כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תָבִ֧יא <WH935> when thou shalt bring עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> and גְּד֖וּד <WH1416> a troop פִּתְאֹ֑ם <WH6597> suddenly כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When כָר֤וּ <WH3738> upon them for they have digged [שִׁיחָה כ] (שׁוּחָה֙ <WH7882> pit ק) לְלָכְדֵ֔נִי <WH3920> to take וּפַחִ֖ים <WH6341> snares טָמְנ֥וּ <WH2934> me and hid לְרַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> for my feet

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> Yet LORD יָדַ֜עְתָּ <WH3045> thou knowest אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֲצָתָ֤ם <WH6098> all their counsel עָלַי֙ <WH5921> against לַמָּ֔וֶת <WH4194> against me to slay אַל־ <WH408> not תְּכַפֵּר֙ <WH3722> [me] forgive עַל־ <WH5921> against עֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> not their iniquity וְחַטָּאתָ֖ם <WH2403> their sin מִלְּפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> from thy sight אַל־ <WH408> not תֶּ֑מְחִי <WH4229> neither blot out [וְהָיוּ כ] (וְיִהְי֤וּ <WH1961> become ק) מֻכְשָׁלִים֙ <WH3782> but let them be overthrown לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> [thus] with them in the time אַפְּךָ֖ <WH639> of thine anger עֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> thee deal בָהֶֽם׃ ס
